name: EdX
description: Online learning that delivers real professional progress across nearly every career discipline, from artificial intelligence and robotics to sustainability and public health. Together with universities and organizations at the forefront of their fields, edX offers thousands of job-relevant programs designed to give every ambitious learner a path to achievement.
features: Flexible pathways to personal and professional achievement.
Educational opportunities at every investment level.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: edX is the online learning platform that readies you, your teams, and your organization for every career moment.
ShortDescription: edX is a platform for learning and career development that offers thousands of courses and programs

Highlights.name: Transforming ambition into impact
Highlights.description: We measure our success by the lives and careers we’ve changed, and transparently share our outcomes for the benefit of all. Here are some of the things we’ve learned and achieved and how we prioritize student success in everything we do.

Highlights.name: Explore careers at 2U
Highlights.description: If you’re passionate about creating learning experiences that drive real progress, you’ll fit right in working alongside our purpose-driven team.

Highlights.name: Helping great organizations create greater opportunity
Highlights.description: On edX, we offer thousands of courses, professional certificates, boot camps, credit-bearing micro credentials, and undergraduate and graduate degrees.

enhanced_description: EdX is a comprehensive online learning platform offering thousands of job-relevant programs across nearly every career discipline, including artificial intelligence, robotics, sustainability, and public health. Collaborating with leading universities and organizations, EdX provides expert-led educational experiences designed to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency for individuals, teams, and entire organizations. The platform supports personal and professional achievement through flexible pathways, offering diverse educational opportunities such as courses, professional certificates, boot camps, credit-bearing micro credentials, and undergraduate and graduate degrees, catering to various investment levels. EdX is committed to transforming ambition into real professional impact by prioritizing student success and measuring outcomes.
key_use_cases: Accelerate skill development and learning efficiency for individuals and organizations.
Enable professional progress across diverse career disciplines.
Provide flexible pathways for personal and professional achievement.
Facilitate team upskilling and reskilling within organizations.
Offer a wide range of educational programs, including courses, professional certificates, boot camps, and degrees.
competitive_advantages: Partnerships with leading universities and organizations for content.
Extensive catalog of thousands of job-relevant programs.
Flexible pathways to personal and professional achievement.
Educational opportunities available at every investment level.
Focus on driving and measuring real professional progress and impact.
Prioritization of student success with transparent outcome sharing.
roi_benefits: Delivers real professional progress for learners.
Accelerates skill development for individuals and organizations.
Transforms ambition into measurable impact on careers.
Prepares individuals, teams, and organizations for future career moments.
